import React from 'react' import moment from 'moment' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import QuestionsDetails from './QuestionsDetails' import Avatar from '../../component/Avatar/Avatar' const DisplayAnswers = ({question, handleShare}) => { return (
{ question.answer.map((ans)=>(

{ans.answerBody}

answered {moment(ans.answeredOn).fromNow()}

{ans.userAnswered.charAt(0).toUpperCase()}
{ans.userAnswered}
)) }
) } export default DisplayAnswers
